response.overview: Jiangxinzhou, a little-known island in the Yangtze river on the western outskirts of Nanjing, is suddenly abuzz with property development. The ancient fish-shaped coins that have long disappeared appear in several shops on the island. Familiar with the island of the broker of two thunder, help the police invited sun teacher secretly visit, trying to calm down. Luo Bin, the old book merchant on the island, the fate of the family and the great river early origin, in or dream or fantasy, that reason. He quietly with similar ancient witchcraft rituals, from the river, the restless spirit, unexpectedly, but the storm to himself
response.title: A Farewell to the River

release_dates.note: 2016 Amphibia Youth Film Festival, Jimei, China
